name: Recommended Activities in Los Angeles, CA

activity.name: Universal Studios Hollywood
activity.location: Universal Studios Hollywood, 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608

activity_details.driving_info: 30 min drive from West Covina to Universal Studios.
activity_details.description: A world-renowned theme park featuring thrilling rides, shows, and attractions based on popular movies.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Perfect for families with kids, offering a variety of attractions for all ages.
reviews: Great for a family day out.

activity.name: Lunch at Bubba Gump Shrimp Co.
activity.location: 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608

activity_details.description: A fun seafood restaurant themed after the movie 'Forrest Gump'.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Family-friendly atmosphere with a diverse menu.

activity.name: Dinner at Three Broomsticks
activity.location: 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608

activity_details.description: A themed restaurant inspired by the Harry Potter series, offering hearty meals.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Unique dining experience for fans of the series.

day_plans.return_to_hotel_driving_info: 30 min drive back to West Covina.

activity.name: California Science Center
activity.location: 700 Exposition Park Drive, Los Angeles, CA 90037

activity_details.driving_info: 40 min drive from West Covina to California Science Center.
activity_details.description: An interactive science museum featuring hands-on exhibits and an IMAX theater.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Educational and fun for kids and adults alike.

activity.name: Lunch at California Science Center Café
activity.location: 700 Exposition Park Dr, Los Angeles, CA 90037

activity_details.description: A casual café offering a variety of healthy options.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Convenient dining option for museum visitors.

activity.name: Los Angeles County Museum of Art

activity_details.driving_info: 15 min drive from California Science Center to LACMA.
activity_details.description: The largest art museum in the west, featuring a diverse collection of art.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Offers a rich cultural experience for families.

activity.name: Dinner at Pitfire Pizza
activity.location: 100 S. La Brea Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90036

activity_details.driving_info: 10 min drive from LACMA to Pitfire Pizza.
activity_details.description: A casual eatery known for its artisanal pizzas and fresh ingredients.

day_plans.return_to_hotel_driving_info: 30 min drive back to West Covina.

activity_details.driving_info: 30 min drive from West Covina to Los Angeles Zoo.
activity_details.description: A large zoo featuring a wide variety of animals and exhibits.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Great for kids to learn about wildlife.

activity.name: Lunch at The Café at The End of The Universe
activity.location: 2800 E Observatory Rd, Los Angeles, CA 90027

activity_details.driving_info: 10 min drive from Los Angeles Zoo to the café.
activity_details.description: A casual café with a unique theme, offering light meals.

activity.name: Griffith Observatory
activity.location: 2800 E Observatory Rd, Los Angeles, CA 90027

activity_details.driving_info: 5 min drive from the café to Griffith Observatory.
activity_details.description: An iconic observatory with stunning views of the city and educational exhibits.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Educational and fun for the whole family.

activity.name: Dinner at The Broad Museum Café
activity.location: 221 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90012

activity_details.driving_info: 30 min drive from Griffith Observatory to The Broad.
activity_details.description: A café located within The Broad Museum, offering a variety of dishes.

day_plans.return_to_hotel_driving_info: 30 min drive back to West Covina.

activity.name: Santa Monica Pier
activity.location: Downtown Santa Monica, Santa Monica, Los Angeles County, California, 90401, United States

activity_details.driving_info: 45 min drive from West Covina to Santa Monica Pier.
activity_details.description: A famous pier with an amusement park, restaurants, and shops.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Fun for the whole family with rides and games.

activity_details.driving_info: 30 min drive from Santa Monica Pier to The Donut Man.
activity_details.description: Famous for its fresh fruit-filled donuts.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: A sweet treat for the family after a fun morning.

activity.name: Hollywood Bowl
activity.location: The BOWL Store, Odin Path, Whitley Heights Historic District, Los Angeles County, California, 90068, United States

activity_details.driving_info: 30 min drive from The Donut Man to Hollywood Bowl.
activity_details.description: An iconic outdoor amphitheater hosting concerts and events.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Great for enjoying music in a beautiful setting.

activity.name: Dinner at Loews Hollywood Hotel
activity.location: 1755 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90028

activity_details.driving_info: 15 min drive from Hollywood Bowl to Loews Hollywood Hotel.
activity_details.description: A stylish restaurant offering a diverse menu with stunning views.
activity_details.why_its_suitable: Perfect for a relaxing dinner to end the trip.
